tr-TR.rank: Rank: $(competitive_rank) | Güncel RR: $(ranked_rating) | Son Maç: $(last_match_rr) | MMR: $(mmr)
tr-TR.match: $(currentplayer), son maçını $(match_score) skoruyla $(match_result). Bu maçtan $(last_match_rr) RR $(match_result). Maç, $(server) sunucusunda $(map) haritasında toplam $(minutes) dakika $(seconds) saniye sürdü. $(currentplayer), maç boyunca $(kills)/$(deaths)/$(assists) K/D/A yaptı. %$(headshot_rate) heashot oranı ile maçı tamamladı.

en-US.rank: Rank: $(competitive_rank) | Current RR: $(ranked_rating) | Last Match: $(last_match_rr) | MMR: $(mmr)
en-US.match: $(currentplayer) has lost his last match by $(match_score). $(match_result) $(mmrlastgame) RR. Match lasted $(minutes) minutes and $(seconds) seconds on $(server) server at $(map) map in total of $(totalrounds) rounds. $(currentplayer) killed $(kills) rival players, died $(deaths) times and made $(assists) assist to his teammates. $(currentplayer) landed $(headshots) headshots and $(bodyshots) bodyshots.
